Private Member Functions

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (BitmapDrawer)

Detailed Description

A Drawer that wraps a bitmap and can be tiled, stretched, or aligned.

You can create a BitmapDrawer from a file path, or from a gaia::graphics::Bitmap object.

It can be defined in an XML file with the <bitmap> element.

Also see the gaia::graphics::Bitmap class, which handles the management and transformation of raw bitmap graphics, and should be used when drawing to a gaia::graphics::Canvas.

Definition at line 41 of file BitmapDrawer.h.

void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::draw ( Canvas *  canvas) [virtual]

Draw in its bounds (set via setBounds) respecting optional effects such as alpha (set via setAlpha) and color filter (set via setColorFilter).

Parameters:
canvasThe canvas to draw into

the gravity applied to the bitmap
int32_t gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::getIntrinsicHeight ( ) const [virtual]

Return the intrinsic height of the underlying drawer object.

Returns -1 if it has no intrinsic height, such as with a solid color.

Reimplemented from gaia::graphics::Drawer.

int32_t gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::getIntrinsicWidth ( ) const [virtual]

Return the intrinsic width of the underlying drawer object.

Reimplemented from gaia::graphics::Drawer.

int32_t gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::getOpacity ( ) const [virtual]

Return the opacity/transparency of this Drawer.

The returned value is one of the abstract format constants in PixelFormat: PixelFormat::UNKNOWN, PixelFormat::TRANSLUCENT, PixelFormat::TRANSPARENT, or PixelFormat::OPAQUE.

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.

int32_t gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::getTileModeX ( ) const

Indicates the repeat behavior of this drawer on the X axis.

Returns:
Shader::CLAMP if the bitmap does not repeat, Shader::REPEAT or Shader::MIRROR otherwise.
int32_t gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::getTileModeY ( ) const

Indicates the repeat behavior of this drawer on the Y axis.

Returns:
Shader::CLAMP if the bitmap does not repeat, Shader::REPEAT or Shader::MIRROR otherwise.
Paint* gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::newPaint ( ) const

Returns the paint used to render this drawer.

Developer needs to delete the pointer by self.

void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setAlpha ( int32_t  alpha) [virtual]

Specify an alpha value for the drawer.

0 means fully transparent, and 255 means fully opaque.

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.

void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setAntiAlias ( bool  aa)

Enables or disables anti-aliasing for this drawer.

Anti-aliasing affects the edges of the bitmap only so it applies only when the drawer is rotated.

Parameters:
aaTrue if the bitmap should be anti-aliased, false otherwise.
void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setColorFilter ( const ColorFilter *  cf) [virtual]

Specify an optional colorFilter for the drawer.

Pass null to remove any filters.

Implements gaia::graphics::Drawer.

void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setDither ( bool  dither) [virtual]

Set to true to have the drawer dither its colors when drawn to a device with fewer than 8-bits per color component.

This can improve the look on those devices, but can also slow down the drawing a little.

Reimplemented from gaia::graphics::Drawer.

void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setFilterBitmap ( bool  filter) [virtual]

Set to true to have the drawer filter its bitmap when scaled or rotated (for drawer that use bitmaps).

If the drawer does not use bitmaps, this call is ignored. This can improve the look when scaled or rotated, but also slows down the drawing.

Reimplemented from gaia::graphics::Drawer.

void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setGravity ( int32_t  gravity)

Set the gravity used to position/stretch the bitmap within its bounds.

Parameters:
gravitythe gravity
void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setTargetDensity ( const Canvas *  canvas)

Set the density scale at which this drawer will be rendered.

This method assumes the drawer will be rendered at the same density as the specified canvas.

Parameters:
canvasThe Canvas from which the density scale must be obtained.

gaia::graphics::Bitmap::setDensity(int32_t)
gaia::graphics::Bitmap::getDensity()
void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setTileModeX ( int32_t  mode)

Sets the repeat behavior of this drawer on the X axis.

By default, the drawer does not repeat its bitmap. Using REPEAT or MIRROR the bitmap can be repeated (or tiled) if the bitmap is smaller than this drawer.

Parameters:
modeThe repeat mode for this drawer.
void gaia::graphics::BitmapDrawer::setTileModeY ( int32_t  mode)

Sets the repeat behavior of this drawable on the Y axis.

By default, the drawable does not repeat its bitmap. Using REPEAT or MIRROR the bitmap can be repeated (or tiled) if the bitmap is smaller than this drawer.

Parameters:
modeThe repeat mode for this drawer.
